video.title: God's Gift: 14 Days
video.synopsis: A grieving mother travels back in time to prevent the tragic murder of her daughter, aided by a private investigator with a connection to the case.

episodes.synopsis: A TV writer and her attorney husband desperately search for their second-grade daughter after she skips a class at school.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun and Ji-hoon wait for the kidnapper to call to negotiate. Soon, Soo-hyun gets a note from a delivery man, which she conceals from the police.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After Soo-hyun is transported to two weeks before Saet-byul died, she decides to catch her daughter's kidnapper and visits Dong-chan's office.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: As Soo-hyun and Dong-chan investigate Saet-byul's case to prevent another death, Ji-hoon doesn't understand his wife's compulsive behaviors.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After arresting Cha Bong-seop, Soo-hyun plans to go to Snake's concert with Saet-byul; Dong-chan finds a picture of his mother in Bong-seop's house.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun suspects Bong-seop wasn't the one who killed Saet-byul; Woo-jin tells Dong-chan that Bong-seop was looking for Young-gyu's biological mother.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Looking for evidence, Soo-hyun goes to Moon-soo's house, but the pictures of Saet-byul that were on his wall aren't there anymore.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun and Saet-byul move into Dong-chan's house; Dong-chan's mother finds out that Ji-hoon was the prosecutor in charge of Dong-ho's case.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: After Snake's concert, Saet-byul and Young-gyu hide in Te-oh's car while trying to evade a mysterious man; they eventually end up at Te-oh's house.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun visits Soo-jung's house, where she finds a photo of Soo-jung and her mother; Ji-hoon reveals that Dong-chan sent him a threatening email.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun gets into a physical fight with the intruder in her house; Woo-jin issues a search warrant for Dong-chan and Soo-hyun.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: While at the TV station with Ji-hoon, Saet-byul goes missing. Dong-chan sends Byung-tae and Jenny to the room where Saet-byul was locked up before.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun explains the picture she saw on the wall of Yoo Jin-woo's ward; Dong-chan thinks that Jin-woo might be an eyewitness to Soo-jung's murder.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun gets on the wanted list for the attempted assassination of the president; Dong-chan takes Soo-hyun to visit her mother in the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Soo-hyun makes a deal. With Bong-seop's trophy items, Ji-hoon gets Saet-byul back, but it turns out those items were fake.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: As Ji-hoon desperately tries to get Saet-byul back, chairman Choo gives Dong-chan something that will help him arrest the real murderer of Soo-jung.
episodes.title: Episode 16
